notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel SRPM in CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8. It addresses 21 CVEs: CVE-2021-4204, CVE-2021-47461, CVE-2022-0500, CVE-2022-23222, CVE-2022-3565, and 16 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel security update for CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8

branches.name: CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8
